DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II , randomize , control , two-center pilot study design ass safety efficacy MEBO treatment 14 subject VLUs . Subjects meet entry criterion randomly assign 1:1 ratio 8 week treatment either MEBO SOC ( 7 subject per treatment arm ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Safety Efficacy MEBO Wound Ointment Subjects With Venous Leg Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: To assess safety efficacy MEBO treatment 14 subject VLUs . Subjects meet entry criterion randomly assign 1:1 ratio 8 week treatment either MEBO SOC ( 7 subject per treatment arm ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female ≥18 year age . 2 . Able willing provide inform consent . 3 . Able willing comply protocol visit procedure . 4 . A fullthickness VLU open continuously ≥4 week ≤1 year . 1 . Ulcer nonvenous hypertensive pathophysiology . 2 . Known suspected allergy component MEBO . 3 . Malignancy target ulcer limb . 4 . Received another investigational device drug within 30 day enrollment . 5 . Noncompliance screen runin period .
